pageTitle: Ceiling Product Details: Metal Clip-In Premium B15 Extra microperforation Rg 0701 - 2748MP

textBeforeTable: Visual Characteristics Item # 2748MP  Download Datasheet Installation and Maintenance Test Reports Guarantee Request Sample Project Gallery Declaration of Performance Toolbox Widely used metal ceiling systems, with panels clipped into Armstrong suspension systems. It features a bonded Armstrong B15 acoustical infill for higher sound attenuation performance. Ideal in offices, where reduction of direct sound transmission between two spaces contributes to better confidentiality. Available with various perforation patterns. INFORMATION Metal Clip-In Premium B15 2748MP
